name: Lighthouse Wall
description: An elaborately carved wall with a peculiar message on it.

dialogs.responseText: "This door is a seal. Though no physical barrier may prevent the passage of the great evils that lie below, the great " -- A large section of the wall is damaged and cannot be read -- "weapons or armor, nor anything imbued with ill intent nor any kind of desire can ever cross this threshold. The wise and powe" -- "hat there should be no expectation of escape once entered here. You have been warned."
